tosdr.case: Invalidity of any portion of the Terms of Service does not entail invalidity of its remainder

title: Invalidity of any portion of the Terms of Service does not entail invalidity of its remainder
quoteText: If any provision or part of a provision of these Terms of Use is found unlawful, void, or unenforceable, that provision or part of the provision is deemed severable from these Terms of Use and will be enforced to the maximum extent permissible, and all other provisions of these Terms of Use will remain in full force and effect.
